Kai Luke Brümmer (nke a na-akpọkwa Brummer; a mụrụ ya na 17 Febụwarị 1993) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
A maara ya maka ọrụ ya dịka Nicholas van der Swart na ihe nkiri Moffie (2019). The Guardian kpọrọ ya otu n'ime ndị ọhụrụ kachasị mma na 76th Venice Film Festival.

A mụrụ Brümmer na Johannesburg ma o tolite na Henley na Klip. Nne ya, onye bụ onye nkuzi ihe nkiri, mere ka ọ mara ime ihe nkiri. Ọ gara St John's College, Johannesburg Ọ gara n'ihu gụsịa akwụkwọ n'afọ 2016 na Bachelor of Arts na Theatre & Performance na ọdịiche na ime ihe nkiri na Mahadum nke Cape Town Ọ bụ nwa oge onye isi mgbaaka maka Boswell Wilkie Circus.
